synopsis.text: In the special OVA episode of "Devils' Line," entitled "Anytime Anywhere," viewers are treated to a continuation of the story beyond the TV anime, delving into the past of the main character's parents. Yuuki pays a visit to his mother, Midori, who takes this opportunity to finally share her long-kept love story. She recounts the tale of meeting Tamaki and the ensuing romance that unfolded between them two decades ago. This unaired episode is exclusively bundled with the limited edition of the 12th volume of the "Devils' Line" manga series, offering fans a unique glimpse into the history of Yuuki's family.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
